system.description:
When you select this archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with Arcana if you do not have it already already. If you are already proficient with Arcana, you gain proficiency in another skill from the scholar list. You also gain an expertise die on Arcana checks. At level 7, this die increases to d6. At 10, it increases to d8 and your maximum size of an expertise die on Arcana checks increases to d10. At level 14, this die increases to a d10 and your maximum size of expertise die on Arcana checks is d12. You may always choose to use Intelligence on Arcana checks.

In addition, you add @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.7nty7q05jugl7lwp]{Rite Master} to your list of available bonus feats.
